interface.name: SunJmxMBeanServer
interface.javadoc:
Extends the MBeanServer interface to provide methods for getting the MetaData and MBeanServerInstantiator objects associated with an MBeanServer.
1.5

Return the MBeanInstantiator associated to this MBeanServer.
UnsupportedOperationException if{@link MBeanServerInterceptor}s are not enabled on this object.
#interceptorsEnabled

Tell whether {@link MBeanServerInterceptor}s are enabled on this object. true if {@link MBeanServerInterceptor}s are enabled. #getMBeanServerInterceptor #setMBeanServerInterceptor #getMBeanInstantiator com.sun.jmx.mbeanserver.JmxMBeanServerBuilder

Return the MBeanServerInterceptor.
UnsupportedOperationException if{@link MBeanServerInterceptor}s are not enabled on this object.
#interceptorsEnabled

Set the MBeanServerInterceptor.
UnsupportedOperationException if{@link MBeanServerInterceptor}s are not enabled on this object.
#interceptorsEnabled

Return the MBeanServerDelegate representing the MBeanServer. Notifications can be sent from the MBean server delegate using the method {@link MBeanServerDelegate#sendNotification}in the returned object.
